entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.2°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to snow or ice pellets in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
